Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <Query Id="0"> <Select Path="Application">*</Select> <Select Path="Security">*</Select> <Select Path="System">*</Select> <Select Path="Windows PowerShell">*</Select> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational"> *[System[EventID=4103 or EventID=4104]] </Select> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-WMI-Activity/Operational"> *[System[EventID=5857 or EventID=5858 or EventID=5859 or EventID=5860 or EventID=5861]] </Select> <Select Path='Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational'> * </Select> </Query> </QueryList>
